description:
http://anidb.net/ch35064 [Fujimiya Momiji] is a descendant of the Kushinada clan whose women possess the power to defeat the Aragami, an alien plant-like race, by sacrifice. After centuries of slumber, the Aragami have awakened and are invading Tokyo en route to conquering the world.
In their way are the hapless schoolgirl Momiji, who becomes infected with one of the Blue Seeds — magatama beads that are the heart and soul of the Aragami, the TAC, a government agency whose sole mission is to stop the Aragami, and http://anidb.net/ch35065 [Kusanagi Mamoru], a young man infused with Aragami blood, who swears vengeance on those who took his family away from him.
Like the heroes of the past, this ragtag band of misfits must work together to defeat an ancient menace from the past, and one far closer to home.

REGULAR.description:
Momiji finds out she isn`t as normal as she thought when she discovers she`s the Kushinada.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kushinada-hime
Princess Kushinada
Princesse Kushinada
奇稲田姫

REGULAR.description:
The TAC show up to protect Momiji from the creatures known as the Aragami.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C`est une énigme ! C`est dur ! C`est mon destin
It`s Cruel! It`s Mysterious! It`s My Destiny!
Nazo Desu! Koku Desu! Watashi no Unmei!!
謎です! 酷です! 私の運命!!

REGULAR.description:
The TAC bring Momiji to Tokyo for her protection but it isn`t as safe as everyone thought.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C`est le printemps ! C`est la capitale ! Je ferai de mon mieux !
Haru Desu! Shuto Desu! Ganbaranakucha!!
It`s Spring! It`s the Capital! I`ll Do My Best!
春です! 首都です! 頑張らなくちゃ!!

REGULAR.description:
Kome has to babysit Momiji during a day around the town and finds out Momiji has another ability no one knew of.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Doushite? Saiaku! Watashi no Daikyou!?
More Bad Luck? Why Does This Always Happen to Me?
Pourquoi ! L`horreur ! Née sous une mauvaise étoile !?
どーして? サイアク! 私の大凶?!

REGULAR.description:
Kusanagi threatens Mrs. Matsudaira when he finds out she`s planning to experiment on Momiji.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Odoroki! Matsunoki! Kagaku na Mama Desu!!
Surprise ! Le petit de Matsu ! Une maman « chimique » !
Surprise! She`s the Mother of Science!
オドロキ! 松の木! 科学なママです!!

REGULAR.description:
Yaegashi worries he isn`t pulling his weight with the TAC and hopes to prove himself with some new tech.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Complicated and Hard to Understand! Being a Man Puts You Into Such a Difficult Position!
Compliqué et difficile à comprendre ! Être un homme met en position difficile !
Fukuzatsu! Nankai! Otoko wa Tsuraine?!
フクザツ! 難解! 男はつらいね?!

REGULAR.description:
A young girl is kidnapped and the kidnappers demand something that could harm Momiji.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`m Fired Up! I`ll Do It! Because I`m the Kushinada!
J`en ai assez ! Je vais le faire parce que je suis une Kushinada !
Moemasu! Yarimasu! Kushinada Mon!!
燃えます! やります! 奇稲田だもん!!

REGULAR.description:
A priestess names Yamazaki appears who considered Momiji her rival and challenges her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hein ? C`est étrange ! Une rivale apparaît !
Nani na no! Hen na no Rival Toujou?!
What? How Strange! A Rival Appears!
何なの! 変なの∇ライバル登場?!

REGULAR.description:
Monster dogs appear and are quickly dispatched by a mysterious figure while Kusanagi and Momiji go on a date.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Are You Serious? Is This a Dream? An Exciting Date!
Es-tu sérieux ? Est-ce un rêve ? Un rendez-vous excitant !
Maji na no?! Yume na no?! Dokidoki Date!!
マジなの?! 夢なの?! ドキドキデート!!

REGULAR.description:
Another Aragami attacks the town, and Kusanagi gives Momiji her first kiss?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Innocence! Love! My First Kiss?!
Innocent ! Amour ! Mon premier baiser !
Jun Desu! Ai Desu! First Kiss?!
純です! 愛です! ファーストキッス?!

REGULAR.description:
Yamazaki not only transfers to Momiji`s class, she`s also spending time with Kusanagi!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Irritant ! Jaloux ! Incroyable !
Irritating! Jealous?! Unbelievable!
Yakimoki! Yakimochi?! Unbelievable!!
ヤキモキ! ヤキモチ?! アンビリーバボー!!

REGULAR.description:
An Aragami is leaving its skin on buildings while Momiji and Kusanagi are both having a hard time.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Can You Feel It? I Can`t Ignore It! An Ominous Premonition of Catastrophe!
Kanjiru?! Ki ni Naru! Hakyoku no Yokan!!
Peux-tu le sentir ? Je ne puis l’ignorer ! Une prémonition catastrophique !
感じる?! 気になる! 破局の予感!!

REGULAR.description:
Momiji gets advice on how to confess to Kusanagi, but things change when someone unexpected reappears.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Love You! This is Extreme! It`s Time to Confess!
Je t’aime ! Ça va tellement loin ! L’heure des confessions !
Suki Desu! Kyuukyoku! Kokuhaku Time?!
好きです! 究極! 告白タイム?!

REGULAR.description:
The return of Kaede and Susano-oh cause confusion while new Aragami begin to pollute Nara with pollen.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Chase Down Yamato Highway! Love Under Fire!!!
Oimasu! Yamatoro! Koi no Midare Uchi!!
Poursuite sur la route de Yamato ! L`amour sous le feu !
追います! 大和路! 恋の乱れ撃ち!!

REGULAR.description:
Momiji and the TAC investigate the appearance of a Kappa, and Momiji finds out just how perfect Kaede is from someone who knew her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Lost and Trembling on a Trip to Michinoku!
Perdue et tremblotante pendant un voyage à Michinoku !
Tomadoi Yurameki Michinoku Kikou
戸惑い ゆらめき みちのく紀行

REGULAR.description:
Kunikida investigates the death of a friend he hasn`t seen for years while a local ghost story plays out.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Japan is a Paradise! Tears in Wakasa!
Le Japon c’est le paradis ! Des pleurs à Wakasa !
Yamato yo Mahoroba Nageki no Wakasa
日本[やまと]よ まほろば 嘆きの若狭

REGULAR.description:
Momiji and Kusanagi worry about an upcoming ritual that will increase the power of Kaede and Susano-oh while Takeuchi tries to comfort Kunikida.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let It Bloom, Japan! A Blizzard of One-Sided Love!!
Que le Japon fleurisse ! Le blizzard de l’amour non-réciproque !
Sakasete! Nippon! Katakoi Fubuki!!
咲かせて! 日本! 片恋吹雪!!

REGULAR.description:
Yamazaki has to confront her past when the Aragami that killed her mother reappears.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Geez! Oh, Man! Sakura`s Not Good Enough?!
Hein ! La vache ! Sakura ne serait pas assez douée ?
Jesus!! Goddamn!! Sakura wa Mijuku?!
ジーザス!! ガッデム!! 桜は未熟?!

REGULAR.description:
Kusanagi and Momiji enter a city that Kaede has trapped in a dome of illusions.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Heat Haze! Love, Start on a Journey! I Won`t Be Far From You!
Kagerou Tabidachi Ai, Hanarenai!
Mon amour, je ne serai pas loin de toi !
陽炎 旅立ち 愛, 離れない!

REGULAR.description:
Momiji returns home to Izumo and Kusanagi battles for his life against Susano-oh.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`m Home! Izumo! The Prologue of Hope!
Je suis rentrée ! Izumo ! Prologue à l’espoir !
Tada Ima! Furusato! Kibou no Joshou!!
ただいま! 出雲[ふるさと]! 希望の序章!!

REGULAR.description:
Momiji and Kaede`s mother faces Kaede and Kusanagi`s fight comes to a bitter end.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Au revoir ! Pas question ! Un adieu en pleurs ?
Goodbye? No Way! A Tearful Farewell?
Sayonara? Iya Desu! Namida no Wakare?!
さよなら? いやです! 涙のわかれ?!

REGULAR.description:
If Momiji is sacrified, Japan will be saved, and Momiji seems resigned to her fate.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kanashimi Unmei Kushinada Kouyou
Sadness! Fate! Momiji Kushinada!
Tristesse, destinée. Momiji Kushinada.
悲しみ 運命 奇稲田紅葉

REGULAR.description:
While hiding from the government, Murakumo kidnaps Momiji, hoping to use her as a bargaining chip against Kaede.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Meeting Again! Starting the Journey! I Won`t Lose!
Nouvelle rencontre, début du voyage. Je ne perdrai pas !
Saikai Tabidachi Watashi Makenai!!
再会 出発[たびだち] 私負けないっ!

REGULAR.description:
Kunikida asks the government to give the TAC a chance to stop the Aragami without sacrificing Momiji and everyone spends one day with their loved ones before the final battle begins.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le soleil couchant, le jour qui arrive. Temps seul pour chacun d’entre nous.
Shizumu Hi Semaru Hi Sorezore no Toki
The Setting Sun! The Coming Day! A Private Time for Each of Us!
沈む陽 迫る日 それぞれの時

REGULAR.description:
Momiji and the TAC begin their attempt to stop enemies on either side who both plan for a new world.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: All or Nothing! Decision! My Fate!
Kakemasu! Kimemasu! Watashi no Unmei!!
Tout ou rien ! Décision ! Mon destin !
賭けます! 決めます! 私の運命!!

REGULAR.description:
As the new world begins to take root, Momiji attempts to use her power as the Kushinada to save everyone, including the sister she never quite knew.
Source: crunchyroll
